topic.title: Why would content signallling fail on zero me?

1530063856_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body:
Politics should be a form of entertainment, may be!
At it's  core it is pitch / strategy for selling risk to masses, by incentivizing  what to vouch your energies for, what to trust/doubt, what to think ...   sure it can be entertaining, entertainment remains a key weapon for that anyway, to distract  people form analysing or using logic, but that does not change the reality of it.
